content:
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Order management system migration
1
• Ensured one-time data migration and ongoing data synchronization, for order 
and customer data, across the order management modules of Magento and 
M2M (legacy ERP system)
• Automated data accuracy validation across both systems on daily basis
Overdenture and dental implant manufacturer

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Conducted an elaborate due-diligence of existing data infrastructure and closely monitored the data migrated in batches to ensure real-time validation
•
Identified data mapping and logic issues between the two systems (Magento & M2M), and flagged them for SI partner to address, to ensure accuracy of the 
migrated data
•
Identified the key fields leading to data transfer failures, and cleansed the data accordingly so that there would be minimum rejections from Magento and 
M2M systems
•
Set up automated data validation scripts and processes, to validate the sanctity of the data within individual systems and across both systems
Situation
•
Client was adopting a new order management tool (Magento), by transitioning from a legacy ERP system (M2M). During the transition, there were issues 
due to incorrect data migration, leading to misdirected orders thereby losing revenue in returns and exchanges, and impacting customer satisfaction
•
Partnered with the client to ensure one-time data migration and ongoing data synchronization, for order and customer data, across the two systems. In 
addition, we automated the data accuracy validation across both systems on daily basis.
M2M to Magento data migration and validation for PE-owned 
medical manufacturing firm
2
Impact
•
Achieved 99% accuracy of the data between the systems, after two iterations of data migration
•
Product returns and exchanges reduced significantly (decrease in returns by ~15%)
•
Sales team spent less time in processing orders and were able to handle more leads per day, leading to increase in revenue
ORDER MANAGEMENT SYSTEM 
MIGRATION

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
